subtitle: This dish incorporates egg noodles with a delicious peanut and soy sauce.

method.text: Cook the noodles in boiling water as pack instructions. Drain well and toss in 1 tablespoon of the oil.
Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a wok or large frying pan and fry the garlic, onion and chilli for 2-3 min.
Add the vegetables and stir-fry for 2-3 min or until vegetables have just softened.
Blend together the remaining oil, soy sauce, ginger, water and peanut butter. Add to the vegetables with the noodles. Continue to stir fry for 1-2 min. Sprinkle over the nuts and serve immediately.

title: Chinese satay style noodles
